SEARCH
Module gamecritic
Package game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
game.Game
public class Game extends Object
Represents game within the application, encapsulating all details relevant to single game entry, acts as a data model for handling game information.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs new review with specified details.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(int id, String title, String developer, String releaseDate, String platforms, String genre, boolean award, String storeLink, String description, String imagePath, int criticsCount, int usersCount, int criticsSum, int usersSum, double criticsScore, double usersScore, double averageScore)
      Constructs new review with specified details.
      Parameters:
      id - unique identifier of the game
      title - title of the game
      developer - name of developer of the game
      releaseDate - release date of the game, formatted as string
      platforms - platforms on which the game is available
      genre - genre of the game
      award - boolean flag indicating if the game has received award
      storeLink - url to game's store page
      description - description of the game
      imagePath - path to game's cover image
      criticsCount - number of critic reviews
      usersCount - number of user reviews
      criticsSum - sum of all critic scores
      usersSum - sum of all user scores
      criticsScore - average score from critics
      usersScore - average score from users
      averageScore - calculated average score of the game, combining both critic and user scores
